                                                                                             /*Code by fearless_coder*/
#include<stdio.h>
int a[1000];
int main()
{
	int t,n,p,i;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		int c=0;
		scanf("%d%d",&n,&p);
		for(i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
			scanf("%d",&a[i]);
			if(a[i]>=p)
			c++;
		}
		printf("%d\n",c);
	}
	return 0;
}
